incidents.description:
Past detention incident that came through hotline, posting for tracking purposes. 

Community arrest 7 am on Monday, 1/5/26 in Salisbury, NC, at the corner of N. Jackson st.  & 11th st.

User posted that two of her children were taken by ICE on Long Street in Salisbury. Accompanying video clip by a different user shows four masked uniformed "agents" wearing tactical vests stopping a blue sedan. Unclear if these are the same two events, but seems likely.
Video shows one individual in fatigues and tactical vest pacing then waiting in parking lot.

Anonymous user posted the attached photo to Retenes. Photo shows small masked agent wearing tactical vest with ERO patch across the front. Caption claims, "Good morning ICE made its first arrests at Nation Ford, they are heading down 485, batteries people, trucks and small cars using."

Verified by Comunidad Colectiva. Image shows two people without vests in plain clothes, unsure if they are officers or not, plus one person who appears to have a black vest on. There is no further information, so it is unclear what type of action this might be.
Person was detained by 3 ICE agents in cars. They had followed him from the court house after a meeting.
ICE vehicle spotted on Church Street in Concord heading into downtown.

U.S. Customs and Border Protection officers conducted a targeted enforcement operation in the Durham area, resulting in the detention of 11 people. All detainees were held at a federal detention facility pending deportation hearings.
Video showing a silver car and 3 black SUVs and 1 white SUV with flashing lights in from of Acura dealership. 2 men wearing vest marked with police.
Individual was detained duing their annual immigration appointment, due to an existing order of deportation.
One man detained while walking out of his apartment around 8am. Held in detention until being deported August 2025.
Homeland security appeared outside a home in the morning asking for a particular person. The moment they were dropped off at their second job, they were detained.
Agents in face coverings and green bulletproof vests have a person pulled over in a neighborhood. Vehicles seem to be one black pick up truck and a Ford SUV. Detention unknown.
Verified by Comunidad Colectiva. Police with black HSI vest questioned at least one person, arrests unknown.
Verified by Comunidad Colectiva. At least one person arrested by ICE. Two officers/agents in the photo, but hard to see the words on their vests to detemine which agency.
Individual was unaware that their court date was changed and went to the initial date. When they got to the court, ICE was there and took them into custody..
Two agents in green army bulletproof vest and face coverings pulling over a truck. Detentions likely.

About 8 months ago, Vidal was charged with solicitation of a minor through the computer.  Wife says he was tricked into communicating with local police through text and was told there was a construction job through the texting which ended in his arrest and charge.  Lawyer counseled him to plead guilty, which he did about three weeks ago.  He was then detained by ICE through local sheriff collaboration.  ---- Wife says that sheriff set him up -- that he was pretending to be a worker who needed a job but then charged him with solicitation of a minor?
Verified by Comunidad Colectiva. At least two people were arrested by ICE. An agent with a green vest and a face covering was walking on a sidewalk.
Verified by Comunidad Colectiva. ICE agents in a white van were confirmed at the court house. Detentions/arrests unknown.
Verified by Comunidad Colectiva. Image shows at least two people in a car being questioned by ICE. Detention unknown.
Verified by Comunidad Colectiva. At least one ICE vehicle was reportedly conducting surveillance. No agents are seen in photo and no detentions known.
A person was detained during an asylum meeting at the USCIS field office in Charlotte.
Video shows 5 unmarked vehicles, at least 5 agents in tactical gear, and one person being arrested on the side of the road.

Verified by Comunidad Colectiva. At least two people arrested by ICE. 
Two agents seen in a white pick up truck and wearing black vests, but not covering faces. Another agent was recording the arrest. Two other individuals ran away and were chased.

location.city: Concord Pkwy N & Poplar Tent Rd

incidents.description: Verified by Comunidad Colectiva. Image shows a traffic stop of a work van by a gray pick up truck that seems to have blue undercover lights. One possible agent in dark clothes is visible, but no further identification is possible from the image. Detentions unknown.

location.city: S Tryon St & W Arrowood Rd

incidents.description: Verified by Comunidad Colectiva. At least one person arrested.
Verified by Comunidad Colectiva. At least one person was arrested by agents or officers dressed in black.
Verified by Comunidad Colectiva. At least one person arrested by ICE. Video shows two agents of some type and one person who appears to be in handcuffs.
Several Customs and Border Patrol agents chased a man across the courthouse lawn and into a nearby pond. They surrounded him and handcuffed him then led him to a nearby vehicle for detention.
Verified by Comunidad Colectiva. Image shows two SUV's parked at Holiday Inn Express in Charlotte. No agents visible, no further information.

One agent is visible in a separate photo in green tactical gear labed Border Patrol and a mask, although unclear if that agent also participated in the arrest. In the video, 3 agents in plain clothes and a black vest are shown, 2 of them also wearing masks. One arrest shown in video.
Verified by Comunidad Colectiva. Several agents conducting surveillance, unknown if they made arrests.
Verified by Comunidad Colectiva. At least one person arrested by ICE.

location.city: N Tryon St & Orchard Trace Ln

incidents.description: Person was going through a domestic abuse case in January. When the person showed up to court in May, he was taken into custody by ICE.
In brief video, there are unmarked black vehicles parked outside of a house. Two visible agents in green tactical gear may be attempting to enter a home. Detentions unknown.
Verified by Comunidad Colectiva. Several agents gather in a church parking lot.

HSI agent driving white pick up truck with SC license plate TUP-633 plus one other unmarked vehicle with blue lights flashing seen in this video. Two visible agents, 1 female in green tactical gear labeled POLICE, 1 male in plain clothes in a black vest that read HSI POLICE. Agents pulled over a silver truck with 4 men inside, and the video showed one man being arrested.
Three agents in green and black tactical gear surrounded a work van. Two unmarked vehicles with blue lights were present. Detentions unknown.

location.city: Reese Blvd and Rose Commons Drive Huntersville

incidents.description: Person had an immigration court appointment and showed up earlier than needed. He was told to return later, but when the person's name was called five officers detained him.
Two visible agents handcuffing a man against a van. One agent was in green tactical gear and carrying a large gun. The other agent was dressed in plain clothes wearing a black vest labeled HSI.
2 agents in army green bulletproof vests, 1 with face covering have someone pulled over
Two visible agents in khaki pants black shirts and green vests, male agent unmasked, female agent masked. Detentions unknown.
A man was outside of laundromat putting clothes in his car when officers detained him and his partner.
At least 4 agents in tactical gear and 4 unmarked vehicles that were parked to create a perimeter and block a part of apartment parking lot. Detentions unknown.
Verified by Comunidad Colectiva. Photo shows one person in black SUV, but no visual evidence of whether this is a federal agent. Unknown if attempted to make an arrest.
More than five agents in army green bulletproof vests, half with face coverings, the other half with hats detaining someone at the gas station. Several big trucks with dark windows were there.
Two unmarked white vehicles with blue lights pulled over one truck. Two agents visible in green and black tactical gear, wearing green vests with faces fully visible. Detention unknown.
At least 2 agents pulled over black car and arrested at least one person. Agents wearing civilian clothes with army green bulletproof vests and hats.

Video shows 4 unmarked vehicles and 5 agents. Two agents chased and pushed down a person who was running in front of a gas station. Three agents appeared shortly after and handcuffed the man on the ground. All agents were in plain clothes and black vests.
Multiple agents in black bulletproof vests and hats are seen detaining someone along side of the road in the photo. No further information.
A person was leaving home when they got pulled over and taken into ICE custody.
Agents visiting home in civilian clothes with black bulletproof vests. One agent with face covering. Detentions unknown.
HSI home visit as seen through door. Detentions unknown.
At least 2 agents, one in black bulletproof vest and another in green bulletproof vest, seen pulling someone over in this photo. Detentions unknown.

location.city: Kings Ridge Dr & E Arrowood Rd

incidents.description: Four to five agents dressed in black bulletproof vests were investigating in a Gastonia neghborhood. Detentions unknown.

Three agents in plain clothes were seen - one with a black "POLICE ICE" vest, one with a green vest, and one with a face mask. They surrounded one vehicle pulled over with people inside. Detentions unknown.

At least 5 unmarked vehicles, 4 visible agents, some in green vests, some in black vests, one with face covering and all in otherwise plain clothes. Five visible vehicles surrounding a black ram truck, agent about to break driver's side window with a pick axe. Detentions unknown but likely.
A gray SUV was doing a stakeout at a house in a neighbhorhood in Kannapolis. The SUV eventually left, no detentions reported.

Video shows 3 unmarked vehicles pulling over a small black sedan. Two agents in plain clothes and black vests, and 1 agent in green vest with a mask. The driver of the car is being arrested in the video.
Worksite Raid at Buckeye Fire Equipment Company with multiple detentions. Other neighboring factories were also canvassed but did not allow entry.
At least three SUVs blocked in a white van. Agents were dressed in green/camo with face coverings. Detentions unknown.
Four agents, three in green police vests and one in a black vest, making a traffic stop. Detentions unknown.

location.city: E W.T. Harris Blvd & The Plaza

incidents.description: Several agents with police vests, green and black, police lettering, face coverings, and a camera man recording the arrest of a person right outside the shopping center. They broke the car window and blocked the car from leaving.

Six agents (some in black vests with Police ICE logo, some in green vests, and two with face coverings) attempting to stop traffic off Idlebrook Road in front of Idlewood Farm apartments. One blue minivan with plates TEV-6077 plus some civilian or unmarked cars. Detentions unknown.
3 agents pretended to need a roofing estimate and detained one person upon arriving to the address.
Two agents were outside of an apartment complex, both with face coverings. Detentions unknown.

Four U.S. Immigrations and Customs Enforcement [ICE] agents went to the Durham County Courthouse on the morning of 7/23/25 to detain a man due to make his first court appearance. The man did not show for court and was not detained.
Four agents detaining 1-2 people in parking lot.  One agent with green civilian shirt and ball cap, one with black police vest and jeans, one with black vest and face covering. Exact time unknown.

Two agents seen in video, one with yellow civilian shirt and black vest that says POLICE HSI. Several vehicles, including a grey tinted truck and two grey SUV's. Agents detained a person in a black car with Georgia license plate.

At least three agents with green and black vests that say "police" and face coverings are interrogating one person they pulled over in a pick up truck. Car behind the pick up truck has blue flashing lights. Arrest or detention unknown.
At least 2 agents or officers in tactical gear with green bullet proof vests are interrogating a person in a silver pick up truck. Detention/arrest unknown.

location.city: Albemarle Rd & N Sharon Amity Rd

incidents.description: A person had moved past TSA screening at PTI airport and was arriving at their gate, heading to Atlanta. They were called by name by a worker at the airport and taken into ICE custody.
Car pulled over by agent in civilian clothes with black plain bulletproof vest. The agent is driving a Ford SUV with undercover blue lights.  Detentions unknown.
Agent in green army vest sighted at an apartment complex. Detentions unknown.
Family pulled over by two officers in civilian clothes with black "POLICE" bulletproof vests. Officers driving truck with dark windows. Detentions unknown.
An agent in plain clothes with a bullet proof black vest was doing a home visit. Detentions unknown.
Two Ford SUVs with black windows were seen in a parking lot with at least one man in an army green vest. Arrests or detentions are unknown.

At least three agents detained a person. One agent was dressed with face covering and bulletproof army green vest and two were in civilian clothes. Cars used were a silver Mustang and red American-made SUV - both tinted and unmarked.

Two unmarked vans pulled over a work van on the side of the road. At least 1 agent pictured with green bulletproof vest and face covering. Photo caption says exit 4 of route 77 on Nations Ford Road, Charlotte. Detentions unknown.
At least 5 agents in dark clothing at the Poderosa (Wingate) Apartments. The image shows 2 vans and 2 cars (silver and black). Detentions unknown.

As a Buncombe County man walked from the county courthouse to his car in the late morning Aug. 21, armed officers working with ICE pulled up in an unmarked SUV and grabbed him in the middle of a crosswalk, multiple officials confirmed to the Citizen Times. At least one officer carried a "tactical AR-15" and two wore bulletproof vests, according to the newspaper. One vest displayed “U.S. Marshals” and another said some form of “police." A photo of the interaction shows two officers in ballcaps and holstered handguns.

A person was pulled over on N. Tryon Street. ICE officer pretended it was a traffic stop, then said they were looking for his old roomate. Agent said they couldn't verify the person's identity even though he had his Honduran passport on him. They took him to the ERO office and detained him.
A person received a letter to show up for a second interview for the adjustment of status process with wife, but then was detained after a previous deporation order from 2010 emerged.
Three agents all dressesd in black stopped a white work van. Agents driving 2 black SUV's and one gray SUV. Detention unknown.

Three men traveling in one car on their way to work construction were pulled over in Durham (Cheek Rd and Midland Terrace) by an ICE agent in a black Jeep with tinted windows (NC license TEV-6050). They asked State Troopers for support who then called Durham Police for K9 unit support. All three were transported to Alamance County Detention Center.

A person was arrested by ICE as of 9:15 the morning of 9/22 in Winston Salem. He was going to his construction work from his house on Waughtown and was stopped on Clemmonsville Rd near Old Lexington Rd.
The Brookford Police Department arrested one man for driving without a license, and later transferred him to ICE custody.
Two black SUV's with dark windows pulled over a car near a motel. Detentions unknown.
Two agents pulled over a worker in a pickup truck. Agents' cars included a dark sedan and a gold Dodge SUV, both with black windows. Detentions unknown..
Two people were picked up from RDU airport, one of them had a deportation order.
Had DUI, as a part pled guilty and chose to pay jail time on weekends. On his first Saturday in jail -- ICE picked him up. Have 3 kids, including one premie baby with no medical conditions now.
Was detained while on a construction job in Charlotte from Selma

A person was pulled over on exit 343 of I-40 because of expired license plate on car (Chevy Malibu). The sheriff initially pulled them over, then called an ICE officer (wearing a long sleeve shirt that had ICE written on it).

A man was pulled over in Sampson County because local law enforcement thought he wasn't wearing a seat belt. Once they pulled him over and checked his license, they realized his work permit had lapsed. The officer called ICE to pick him up.

location.city: US 13 near I-40 in Newton Grove

incidents.description: A man was pulled over as he was on his way back home from work. He was driving a black Nissan.
An agent in a vest pulled over a vehicle. A black Nissan Sentra with flashing lights was blocking another car.
Jailed in Cabarrus County, and was put on an ICE hold, where ICE picked him up.
Agents in the parking lot of Brookwood Inn with vehicles with blue lights flashing. Detentions unknown.
Detained at his immigration check-in, he's been going for two years without a problem, but got a notice to appear for a hearing. He gave himself up at the border for asylum

location.city: Charlotte Immigration Court 5701 Executive Center Drive

incidents.description: Seven or eight agents with green vests seen staging/preparing in a parking area in early morning hours. Five dark colored vehicles nearby.
A white SUV was pulled over by one blue SUV, one black SUV, and one silver sedan. Three agents had green vests and faces covered. One man detained.

location.city: Exit 42 N. Tryon onto I-85 Charlotte

incidents.description: Charlotte airport, Nov 13 Thursday iba en un vuelo a Los Angeles y el tenia los papeles el abogado dijo que podia viajar, ICE estaba esperando el vuelo, weren't looking for him, they just acercaron porque parecian hispano. Yesterday the wife said they had taken him to Atlanta, was denied water and food in detention, was denied taking his personal effects with him, even his shoes, from Atlanta to Louisiana, was loaded onto a plane but returned for mechanical problems three days ago, no word from him sense. He's from El Salvador.
Church pastor reports one person was detained in the church driveway (report to hotline) Central UMC
2 SUVS in parking lot. Dealer plates on one. 4 masked CBP agents in parking lot of fitness connection, using binoculars to look into vehicles. date changed from 11/16 to 11/15
At least 10 wearing black and grey, some masked, standing near At Home. 1 white SVU, 2 black SVUs, 1 silver SVU.

Two border patrol agents dressed in black arrive at a tire store in a white SUV. One person runs away from tire store. Two agents jump out of white SUV chase him down the sidewalk. The owner of the tire shop told a reporter that her lead mechanic had been arrested. Both FB postings the same.

Video: Security camera footage of two men walking under the awning of a business, green/gray minivan pulls up behind them and two BP agents in green shirts/pants and black vests exit the vehicle and chase the two men off video. A black SUV follows the minivan in the same direction.
Man in blue shirt + grey pants being detained. Several masked men in camo with 'police' on their tops. White SVU and black SVU.
Multiple BP/ICE agents (30 +/-) at Home Depot stopping people. Cannot confirm exact time as it is not listed on the post.

Shot from inside fiesta patria restaurant; one unmasked man wearing a black vest stands outside a pickup truck; another man joins and is given a "police: federal agent" vest by the first. both walk away
May be related to incident #14. 1 person, probably a man based on audio from video, likely wearing a pink or red shirt, being detained by at least 3 men wearing green/brown.

VIDEO: Gray minivan with 3 officers, green vests + masks, picking one person off the sidewalk and putting him in the back of the minivan. No front license plate. Video is taken from pretty far away, no faces visible, no one appears to be closer or interacting with agents. (note: there is a photo of this same incident in FB post related to incident 5,7,8)
A white work van was stopped by agents with face coverings and green vests. The agents had a silver Charger and 3 SUVs.

location.city: Arrowood Road Exit 3 of I-77 Charlotte

incidents.description: Border Patrol is chasing a man wearing green construction shirt
Hotline caller reported BP made an arrest at apartments at this location. The agents left in a group of 4-5 SUVs.

Video: Three agents detain a man at Supermercadito El Salvador. Two agents diagonally across the intersection at Cuzcatlan restaurant and Salvadoran market arrest another man wearing black. Silver or white SUV at restaurant.
He was walking to the store on S Blvd when he got cornered by mulitple cars.
An officer is outside of Quick Trip, then gets in his vehicle (a black SUV).
Photo: Agent in green getting into a white SUV. Detentions unknown.
Two agents are seen with face coverings and green vests. They are talking to a man next to a black sedan. Detentions unknown.

A border patrol officer is seen holding a man, and other border patrol officers are shown talking to a lady. G. Bovino is shown wearing camo. Agents all have faces covered, some with black vests and some with green vests on.

A man was sitting in his red pick up truck in the parking lot of the Dollar General. Two to three agents with face masks and green vests physically pulled him out and restrained him on the ground, while another 2-3 agents guarded the location. It was later confirmed by news that he was a US citizen.
Working near Wells Fargo on Central Ave. and was cornered and arrested on the job site.

Three agents detain a man at Supermercadito El Salvador. Two agents diagonally across the intersection at Cuzcatlan restaurant and Salvadoran market arrest another man. Silver or white SUV at restaurant.
At least one woman detained by at least four agents outside Pep Boys
White, black, and tan vehicles spotted near El Taco Veloz and the Fashion Warehouse
Verified by Comunidad Colectiva
Verified by Comunidad Colectiva; Atrium. White marked Border Patrol vehicle in emergency room parking lot. (linked to incident where a person was arrested by BP and then passed out)
Black Jeep SUV in parking lot, Georgia plate, report of masked agents
A person was handcuffed next to a gray SUV. Two agents were wearing face masks and green vests. Arborgate apartments are in the background.
Two trucks with masked border patrol agents in front of the Klever mechanic workshop on South Blvd. Detentions unknown.
At least 5 masked Border Patrol officers are present., Two men are handcuffed and being detained.

VIDEO #3 in the facebook post:  Filmed from inside a restaurant. 4 masked and armed agents wearing green fatigues detaining one man with a red hat. They handcuff him and put him in the back of a van. One officer got out of that van and got into a different SUV.

Two border patrol agents dressed in black arrive at a tire store in a white SUV. One person runs away from tire store. Two agents jump out of white SUV chase him down the sidewalk. The owner of the tire shop told a reporter that her lead mechanic had been arrested. Both FB postings the same.
Photo: Agent in green getting into a white SUV. Detentions unknown.
Border Patrol is chasing a man wearing green construction shirt
An officer is outside of Quick Trip, then gets in his vehicle (a black SUV).
Two agents are seen with face coverings and green vests. They are talking to a man next to a black sedan. Detentions unknown.
Multiple BP/ICE agents (30 +/-) at Home Depot stopping people. Cannot confirm exact time as it is not listed on the post.
Border patrol SUV enters parking lot; four agents confront individual in purple top and black pants standing on island; someone else approaches from behind (seems like they're also being detained)
A white work van was stopped by agents with face coverings and green vests. The agents had a silver Charger and 3 SUVs.

A border patrol officer is seen holding a man, and other border patrol officers are shown talking to a lady. G. Bovino is shown wearing camo. Agents all have faces covered, some with black vests and some with green vests on.

A man was sitting in his red pick up truck in the parking lot of the Dollar General. 2-3 agents with face masks and green vests physically pulled him out and restrained him on the ground, while another 2-3 agents guarded the location. It was later confirmed by news that he was a US citizen.

Video: Three agents detain a man at Supermercadito El Salvador. Two agents diagonally across the intersection at Cuzcatlan restaurant and Salvadoran market arrest another man wearing black. Silver or white SUV at restaurant.
Gray minivan with 3 officers, green vests + masks, picking one person off the sidewalk and putting him in the back of the minivan. No front license plate.

About 10 Border Patrol agents and a woman in a pink shirt were standing in a parking lot behind a building. Six vehicles were visible, including white SUV's, pick up trucks. No arrests being made, seems more like a staging meeting.
No arrests being made, but two agents are seen talking. One is wearing a black police vest, and then hands a black police vest to the other. Video shot from inside a restaurant.
4-5 Border Patrol/ICE agents were detaining 1-2 people on the side of the road. There were 2 pickup trucks, an SUV, and a Sedan present. Lights were flashing on first black pickup truck.
Two Border Patrol/ICE agents seen sprinting across parking lot to access door of establishment. This video was taken from inside the Pollo Campero (signage in the doorway), but time is not clear.
Some people are being arrested in front of a laundromat on South Blvd. Agents are masked and have uniforms of Border Patrol. Location is near Wow Supermarket.
Person is recording from in front of the Baleada Grill. A man in a white shirt is running away across the street, pursued by 3 or 4 agents on foot. A dark-colored SUV pulls up to get closer.
Both videos seem to have the same SUVs. Masked agents get out of all four vehicles. No known detentions. Commenters say that this is the Walmart on Independence Blvd.
At least 10 agents wearing black and grey, some masked, standing near At Home. 1 white SUV, 2 black SUVs, 1 silver SUV.
No arrests, just a huddle
Three masked BP agents in green uniforms driving a white SUV detain a man in blue jeans, green shirt, and blue baseball hat. Residential neighborhood, reportedly walking home.
ICE/CBP presence verified by Comunidad Colectiva
Person taking the video says the BP cars are hidden, so this is also a preliminary report
Report about a Kindercare location, but without images. Later verified by Comunidad Colectiva
Report of Border Patrol near Lebos Western wear, but without images. Later verified by Comunidad Colectiva.
Dany's supermarket at The Plaza and Milton, no photo, considered preliminary but mentioned by several posts

A Charlotte police vehicle is parked, and masked BP agents are standing in the parking lot speaking to the police officer. Video indicates Walmart on N. Tryon. User comments mention Bovino as being present.
Dubai Night club, right next to La Unica supermarket. No image, considered preliminary
Employees identified agents outside of La Unica Supermarket. Also mentioned above in incident 46

Near Little Caesars and a mechanic shop, a masked border patrol agent is talking to a man in a red shirt next to his pick up truck. According to comments in the post, the man was able to provide his identity and was not detained.
Preliminary report of 2-3 agents in parking lot of Wow Supermarket, Panaderia Odalys
Video of bronze Chevy Tahoe in Sam's parking lot with license plate obscured, identified as ICE by people driving behind but not yet verified
Photo of 4 masked BP agents surrounding person in car in Walmart parking lot
Verified by Comunidad Colectiva; Home Depot
Image of masked BP agents, states that they were at the QuikTrip gas station on N. Tryon.
Video showing mutliple vehicles and masked agents in green gathering on street outside Winslow Apartments off South Blvd
Video & pic showing multiple ice vehicles & agents in walmart parking lot on albermarle rd
Photo of masked agent talking to another agent in white SUV in parking lot
Video of BP agents. Exit 40 on I-85 is Graham Street in North Carolina
Video of CBP detaining person at Walmart, multiple CBP vehicles
Verified by Comunidad Colectiva; Whitehall Commons
Verified by Comunidad Colectiva; arrest made at Compare Foods near Sugar Creek. Protestors were present yelling at the agents.
Verified by Comunidad Colectiva; Home Depot
Reports of ICE patrolling area, also near Swansboro Ln
Unmarked vehicles reported patrolling Vista Villa Apartments
Verified by Comunidad Colectiva; Aurea Station Apartments
spotted patrolling near Charlotte Latin School
Several masked BP agents jumped out of a minivan at an intersection, while other vehicles drove off quickly chasing a white work van.

Several masked BP agents arrested a person in Compare foods parking lot while onlookers protested and commented. One comment was that the person arrested was a legal resident. Several dark SUVs and one white SUV were nearby at the scene.

Verified by Comunidad Colectiva; Weeping Willow AME Zion Church. Man collapsed while ICE was trying to pull him from his car. He was taken to a local Atrium hospital. Reports say the man appeared to be alive and moving, just shocked. His condition at the hospital is unknown at this time
Masked BP agents arrest several persons near a food truck. The agents have a white SUV parked near Julie's convenience mart and several black SUVs.
Several masked BP agents outside of Compare foods, but no arrests.
Several masked BP agents were standing at the intersection and stopping cars.

location.city: E W.T. Harris Blvd & Grier Rd

incidents.description: Image shows several masked Border Patrol agents in the parking lot of Walmart,
Went to jail for a dispute. Has had multiple catch and release and deportation order in the past. Re-entered 3 times.
Driving a white work van, and was pulled over near Arwood Rd.
Several masked BP agents jumped out of a minivan at an intersection, while other vehicles drove off quickly chasing a white work van.
Hotline caller reported BP made an arrest at apartments at this location. The agents left in a group of 4-5 SUVs.

Video: Security camera footage of two men walking under the awning of a business, green/gray minivan pulls up behind them and two BP agents in green shirts/pants and black vests exit the vehicle and chase the two men off video. A black SUV follows the minivan in the same direction.

Video: three BP agents in green clothing and face coverings question a man standing on a ladder and putting up Christmas lights in a family's front yard. The property owner is filming and tells BP agents to leave, they get in a gray/blue minivan and drive away followed by a black SUV. The man being questioned is not detained and leaves in his own vehicle.
ICE/CBP presence verified by Comunidad Colectiva
Report about a Kindercare location, but without images. Later verified by Comunidad Colectiva
Report of Border Patrol near Lebos Western wear, but without images. Later verified by Comunidad Colectiva.
Preliminary report of 2-3 agents in parking lot of Wow Supermarket, Panaderia Odalys
Person taking the video says the BP cars are hidden, so this is also a preliminary report
Dubai Night club, right next to La Unica supermarket.  No image, considered preliminary
Dany's supermarket at The Plaza and Milton, no photo, considered preliminary but mentioned by several posts

A Charlotte police vehicle is parked, and masked BP agents are standing in the parking lot speaking to the police officer. Video indicates Walmart on N. Tryon. User comments mention Bovino as being present.
Photo of 4 masked BP agents surrounding person in car in Walmart parking lot
Image of masked BP agents, states that they were at the QuikTrip gas station on N. Tryon.
Video of BP agents. Exit 40 on I-85 is Graham Street in North Carolina

location.city: maybe QT gas station at 4270 Trailer Dr

incidents.description: Video of CBP detaining person at Walmart, multiple CBP vehicles
Video showing mutliple vehicles and masked agents in green gathering on street outside Winslow Apartments off South Blvd
Verified by Comunidad Colectiva; Whitehall Commons
Verified by Comunidad Colectiva; Home Depot
Verified by Comunidad Colectiva; arrest made at Compare Foods near Sugar Creek. Protestors were present yelling at the agents.
Photo of masked agent talking to another agent in white SUV in parking lot
Verified by Comunidad Colectiva; Home Depot

Video shows 3 BP agents in green uniforms outside a man's car window. He is recording from inside and refusing to roll down the car window. The agents then shatter his window and drag the man out of his car. No detention was made.
Verified by Comunidad Colectiva; Aurea Station Apartments
Three masked BP agents in green uniforms driving a white SUV detain a man in blue jeans, green shirt, and blue baseball hat. Residential neighborhood, reportedly walking home.

Verified by Comunidad Colectiva; Weeping Willow AME Zion Church. Man collapsed while ICE was trying to pull him from his car. He was taken to a local Atrium hospital. Reports say the man appeared to be alive and moving, just shocked. His condition at the hospital is unknown at this time

Near Little Caesars and a mechanic shop, a masked border patrol agent is talking to a man in a red shirt next to his pick up truck. According to comments in the post, the man was able to provide his identity and was not detained.
Masked BP agents arrest several persons near a food truck. The agents have a white SUV parked near Julie's convenience mart and several black SUVs.
A masked BP agent was seen getting into a white SUV in the parking lot of a mariachi restaurant. Detentions unknown
Verified by Comunidad Colectiva

Several masked BP agents arrested a person in Compare foods parking lot while onlookers protested and commented. One comment was that the person arrested was a legal resident. Several dark SUVs and one white SUV were nearby at the scene.
Several masked BP agents outside of Compare foods, but no arrests.
Reports of ICE patrolling area, also near Swansboro Ln

4 agents in vests, masks, and dark and camo colored clothing pulled someone out of a silver truck parked in front of the apartment building. Another agent ran up as they wrestled with the person being detained. A moment later, a white truck drove up and three agents got out of the truck and went over to the sidewalk where they were holding the person.

A worker in Morrisville who was in a car accident w ICE this morning. He's currently in the WakeMed Brier Creek Emergency Department, had a knee injury. I wasn't able to get all the details clearly, but I think he was rammed by the agents (on purpose or by accident), tried to move his car off the road, at which point they rammed him on purpose, totalled his car. He got out of the car, knee injured and "todo mareado", they pointed guns at him on the sidewalk, grabbed him and shoved him to the ground, hit his head. At that point they finally asked if he was hurt, and he said yes his knee was hurt, and he said yes, his knee was injured, and so the ambulance was called. He was at Brier Creek Hospital, and then was detained upon discharge around 2pm on 12/2. He was then held for two days at Wake County Sheriff's Office, and is being federally charged with ramming his vehicle into federal agents' vehicles (which he disputes). His next hearing is 12/10, where he will be assigned a public defender.

We can confirm at least two arrests at the CIS (Citizenship & Immigration Services) office today, 12/4, and yesterday, 12/3. In one instance, it was the supposed to be the last appointment before receiving citizenship.

On the morning of 12/4, Magdiel was driving to visit someone out east and was pulled over. Brother was unsure of which agency detained brother. It occurred somewhere on Holcombe Rd in Jacksonville NC. He was then put into an ICE hold.

GREENSBORO: Today at 9am a vehicle with a driver and a passenger was rammed by ICE/DHS agents near 4th and Sullivan. 3-5 vehicles with tinted windows and police lights, new model Chevy and Ford SUVs. An ICE vehicle rear-ended the victims while another vehicle drove around them striking them from the front. The male victim got out and was clearly injured. The ICE agents arrested him. They were armed with rifles, did not have their faces covered, one had a vest that says "HSI Police". Our volunteers are in touch with the family and helping them search for the injured person.

The person was followed by ICE agents to the school. After she dropped off her child she was pulled over, they were wearing masks and attempted to open her car door, demanding to see ID. They eventually left and she left the area.

Family lives in Washington, NC. She went in for her interview at 9am. Had an interperter with them. "I already read over your file, i don't need you - they said to interpeter and daughter" They said they'd talk to her only. Attorney was on the call the whole time. In the middle of the interview, the ICE agents came in and arrested it. The agent that was doing the interview had said they were going to approve it but then the ICE agents interpetted to arrest us. Permanent Residency -- Work permit that was good until Nov 2030 - had just renewed it. Julie Solonan in Marlyand. She had legal parole. She had a deportation from 1998 but was never notified. 2023 was let in legally. In '98 had an attorney who made them sign things and had things sent to a PO box that she did not have access to. Attorney has already sent an emergency motion to reopen the case. She's not coming up on the ICE locator. Judy Bary (Greg Murphy) - works for her - has poltical connections - has worked for her 30 years - republican donor.

Confirmed ICE encounter by bystanders and Verifier. 3-5 vehicles with tinted windows and emergency light (Chevys and Fords) targeted a Hispanic male and female driving in their vehicle. ICE vehicle rear ended the victims vehicle while another vehicle drove around them striking them from the front. The male victim got out and was clearly injured. The ICE agents arrested him. They were heavily armed and wearing cowboy hats, ski masks and ballistics vests. A Verifier was on scene at this time. ICE left with the male victim.

We can confirm at least two arrests at the CIS (Citizenship & Immigration Services) office today, 12/4, and yesterday, 12/3. In one instance, it was the supposed to be the last appointment before receiving citizenship.

3 autos de agentes federales los pararon, chocaron su auto, se bajaron con rifles automatics, los sacaron del auto, detuvieron a su esposo y se llevaron. A ella la esposaron pero luego la dejaron ir.  Dejaron a sus niños en la escuela, cuando iban de regreso a la casa, varias camionetas negras con vidrios polarizados los pararon, chocaron su auto en el medio de la calle, tenían armas grandísimas, los sacaron del auto y se lo llevaron al esposo. A ella la esposaron, la amenazaron con "balearla" si se resistía y luego la soltaron. Hay muchos testigos y videos que ya fueron enviados a siembra.  Nissan beige car. Have videos that already sent to Siembra./ 

Three vehicles with federal agents stopped them, rammed their car, got out with automatic rifles, pulled them out of the vehicle, detained her husband, and took him away. They handcuffed her but later let her go. They had left their children at school, and when they were heading back home, several black SUVs with tinted windows stopped them, rammed their car in the middle of the street, and were carrying very large weapons. They pulled them out of the car and took the husband away. She was handcuffed, threatened with being “shot” if she resisted, and then released. There are many witnesses and videos that have already been sent to Siembra. Beige Nissan car. Videos have already been sent to Siembra.
They live in Raleigh. They were the second people detained, "and many followed".

ICE stop on the highway -- direct, he had a deportation order. Night time (~7pm) stop by unmarked car w the blue lights on highway in Raleigh/Durham area. 2 agents. (Not a reten.) Hugo had an outstanding deportation order. Seemed like maybe they knew exactly who they were looking for/ how to find him??? They did not allow him a call, but they let him send an audio message to his son, who later communicated with the friend who called us. Hugo has been transferred to Charlotte. Seems his phone is off so unable to get in touch. No family in the U.S. Call the friend on the 1st page who is from the same town as the detained person.
